comment: Don't bash other people's race or country. If you look around at your surroundings the U.S is nowhere near perfect to speak on others.
amr:

      :snt1 (b / bash-01

            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (r / race
                        :poss (p / person
                              :mod (o2 / other)))
                  :op2 (c / country
                        :poss p)))
      :snt2 (p2 / perfect-02

                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "U.S."))
            :mod (n2 / near

                  :ARG2 (p3 / person
                        :mod (o3 / other)))))
